 <title>Hayden Panettiere Is Reentering Treatment For Postpartum Depression</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Hayden-Panettiere-Treatment-Postpartum-Depression-2016-41300129</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Hayden-Panettiere-Treatment-Postpartum-Depression-2016-41300129"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media2.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/978/n/1922398/f468ac22_edit_img_image_845315_1463091195.large.jpg" /></a><p></p>
<p><br>
<p><a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Hayden Panettiere" href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/Hayden-Panettiere" target="_blank">Hayden Panettiere</a> is checking into a rehab facility for ongoing treatment of her post-partum depression. The actress <a href="https://twitter.com/haydenpanettier/status/730854394770673665"  target="_blank">took to Twitter on Thursday to announce the news</a>, saying, "The postpartum depression I have been experiencing has impacted every aspect of my life. Rather than stay stuck due to unhealthy coping mechanisms I have chosen to take time to reflect holistically on my health and life. Wish me luck!" The same day Hayden made her announcement, it was also revealed that her <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/entertainment/ABC-Cancels-Nashville-41295954" >ABC show <b>Nashville</b> had been cancelled</a> after four seasons.</p>
<p>Hayden first opened up <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Hayden-Panettiere-Out-NYC-October-2015-38757684" >about her struggles with postpartum depression</a> in October, nearly a year after giving birth to her daughter, Kaya. At the time, her rep confirmed to <strong>People</strong> that she would be receiving treatment, and Hayden had been vocal about her battle, saying in an interview, "Women need to know that they're not alone, and that it does heal." In January, she <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Hayden-Panettiere-Critics-Choice-Awards-2016-39836447" target="_blank">made her return to the red carpet at the Critics' Choice Awards</a> and also <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Hayden-Panettiere-Wladimir-Klitschko-After-Treatment-39237187" >supported her fiancé, Wladimir Klitschko</a>, at his boxing match in Germany. </p>
<p>As recently as March, Hayden seemed to be gaining control of her depression and hoping to inspire other women to be equally brave. During <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Hayden-Panettiere-Talks-About-Postpartum-Depression-2016-40678373" >an interview with <b>People</b></a>, the 26-year-old revealed that she had "been trying to be much more open and honest about who I am," adding, "I'm an adult, and [I don't] have to falsify who I am." </p>
</description>

<item>
 <title>Follow Blake Lively on Her Flawless Week at the Cannes Film Festival</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Blake-Lively-Cannes-Film-Festival-2016-Pictures-41297466</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Blake-Lively-Cannes-Film-Festival-2016-Pictures-41297466"><img width="107" height="160" src="http://media1.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/595/n/1922398/ef07e6b645e16241_GettyImages-530954234Sd0GG0.large.jpg" /></a><p><a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Blake Lively" href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/Blake-Lively" target="_blank">Blake Lively</a> landed in the South of France <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Blake-Lively-France-May-2016-41250632" target="_blank">for the Cannes Film Festival</a> this week, and the actress is already blowing us away with <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/fashion/Blake-Lively-Juan-Carlos-Obando-Jumpsuit-Cannes-2016-41277877" target="_blank">her stunning red carpet looks</a> and cute glimpses of her growing baby bump. Blake, who is <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Blake-Lively-Pregnant-Set-April-2016-40942408" >pregnant with her second child with husband Ryan Reynolds</a>, kicked things off at a photocall for her new film, <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Cafe-Society-Trailer-41069393" target="_blank">Woody Allen's <strong>Café Society</strong></a>, on Wednesday; she was all smiles in a red jumpsuit and <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Blake-Lively-Kristen-Stewart-Cannes-Film-Festival-2016-41269724" >shared sweet interactions with her co-stars Kristen Stewart</a>, Jesse Eisenberg, and Corey Stoll. Later that evening, Blake was back on the carpet <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/fashion/Blake-Lively-Dress-Cafe-Society-Cannes-Premiere-41279449" target="_blank">in a gold sequinned gown</a> for the movie's premiere, which also coincided with the festival's star-studded opening ceremony, and the next day she stepped out in a gorgeous yellow velvet dress. </p>
<p>Keep reading to see all of Blake's flawless moments from the Cannes Film Festival so far, and be sure to <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/fashion/Cannes-Film-Festival-Style-2016-41278224" target="_blank">keep up with all the glamorous arrivals</a>. </p>
</description>

<item>
 <title>Is Jon Snow a Twin? The Twist That Would Actually Shock You</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Jon-Snow-Twin-Theory-41297425</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Jon-Snow-Twin-Theory-41297425"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media4.popsugar-assets.com/files/2015/08/28/939/n/1922283/443395f9_edit_img_image_2387502_1440797272.large.jpg" /></a><center></center>
<p>Just when you think you have <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/Game-of-Thrones" target="_blank"><b>Game of Thrones</b></a> all figured out, the writers throw us for a loop. Jon Snow is alive, and it looks like <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Jon-Snow-Parents-Game-Thrones-Season-6-41184159" target="_blank">we may finally meet his real parents</a>. We've had a year to speculate about <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Who-Jon-Snow-Real-Parents-Game-Thrones-37670751" target="_blank">who Jon Snow's parents really are</a>, but some <a href="https://www.reddit.com/r/asoiaf/comments/1e361x/spoilers_all_meera_reed_more_than_meets_the_eyes/"  target="_blank">fans on Reddit have been focusing</a> on another member of his family tree: a twin sister. Boom!</p>
<p>The theory, known as "R + L = J + M," assumes that Jon Snow's parents are Rhaegar Targaryen and Lyanna Stark (Ned's sister), which hopefully will be confirmed soon, since Bran is having all those flashbacks. But that's not all! Before <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/What-Happens-Tower-Joy-Game-Thrones-41251346" target="_blank">Lyanna dies at the Tower of Joy</a>, her final words to Ned Stark are, "Promise me, Ned." One would think that she's asking him to take care of her son (Jon Snow), but what if she's asking him to protect both Jon and his sister? In that case, Ned and the only other survivor of that battle at the Tower of Joy split up the twins, each caring for one. So, who was the other guy? Howland Reed, Meera's father. Yes, the same Meera who basically looks like a girl version of Jon Snow.</p>
<center></center>
<p>At this point, it's almost canon that Jon Snow is the son of Rhaegar and Lyanna, so if <strong>Game of Thrones</strong> confirmed it, it won't be much of a revelation. It <i>would</i>, however, be surprising if this theory comes true and Jon has a sister. Perhaps this is why Meera is still around <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Who-Children-Forest-Game-Thrones-41171812" target="_blank">talking to Children of the Forest</a> when practically every other tertiary character has been killed off. Chew on that.</p>
<center></center>
</description>

<item>
 <title>Lara Worthington Keeps Mum on Baby Rumours: "Being Pregnant Is Such a Personal Thing"</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Lara-Worthington-Kyle-Jackie-O-Interview-May-2016-41297622</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Lara-Worthington-Kyle-Jackie-O-Interview-May-2016-41297622"><img width="107" height="160" src="http://media2.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/13/074/n/4852708/83e91a65_edit_img_cover_file_3040679_1463100278_GettyImages-494TZGaI8.large.jpg" /></a><p>Lara Worthington opened up about <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Pictures-Lara-Bingle-Son-Rocket-Worthington-37871950" target="_blank">her son Rocket</a>, husband <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Sam Worthington" href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/Sam-Worthington" target="_blank">Sam Worthington</a> and life in New York when she appeared on <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/tag/Kyle-&amp;-Jackie-O" target="_blank">Kyle &amp; Jackie O on KIIS 1065</a> on Friday morning. </p>
<p>There was a lot of hype that Lara was going on the show to confirm or deny rumours of her second pregnancy (some outlets are reporting she's five months along) but the topic barely came up. Rather, Lara agreed with Jackie's sentiment that being asked about babies is somewhat intrusive, commenting, "being pregnant is such a personal thing for a woman." </p>
<p>Lara also gave a little update on 13-month-old Rocket - when she's away without him she "just sleeps!" - and how Sam's going filming the follow-ups to his blockbuster film <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/tag/Avatar" target="_blank"><strong>Avatar</strong></a>.
</p>
<p>Keep reading for what we learned from Lara's chat with Kyle &amp; Jackie O!</p>
</description>

<item>
 <title>Katy Perry Responds to Rumours That Orlando Bloom Cheated on Her in the Classiest Way Possible</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Katy-Perry-Responds-Orlando-Bloom-Cheating-Rumours-41298492</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Katy-Perry-Responds-Orlando-Bloom-Cheating-Rumours-41298492"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media4.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/112/n/1922398/771dc8eb_edit_img_image_17268548_1463103231_728.large.jpg" /></a><p></p>
<p>Attention, world: Katy Perry is not here for your cheating "conspiracy." After photos of <a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/news/selena-gomez-starts-revival-tour-parties-with-orlando-bloom-w205620?utm_source=popsugar.com&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=pubexchange_article"  target="_blank">Selena Gomez and Orlando Bloom partying together in Las Vegas</a> surfaced, many wondered if Katy, who has been dating Orlando since <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Katy-Perry-Orlando-Bloom-Dating-39754874" target="_blank">they cosied up to each other at the Golden Globes in January</a>, would have anything to say about it. After <a href="https://twitter.com/katyperry/status/730640626643918848"  target="_blank">tweeting</a>, "is that all there is?" along with a song by Peggy Lee of the same name early on Thursday, Katy brushed off the rumours in the classiest way possible. "Instead of giving energy &amp; eyeballs to a dumb conspiracy, check out how C👁👁L this is," she tweeted later that same day, with a link to <a href="http://time.com/4316476/orlando-bloom-unicef-report-education/"  target="_blank">Orlando's charity work with Unicef</a>.</p>
<p>The couple has made plenty of adorable appearances since they started dating earlier this year, from <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Katy-Perry-Orlando-Bloom-Coachella-2016-Pictures-40963063" >holding hands at Coachella</a> in April to spending <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Katy-Perry-Orlando-Bloom-Met-Gala-Afterparty-2016-41175934" >a fun night out at the Met Gala together</a> in May. Here's hoping their romance continues to heat up all summer. See Katy's tweet below, and then check out <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Katy-Perry-Orlando-Bloom-Charity-Cancer-Gala-2016-40942487" target="_blank">photos from Katy's recent, stunning red carpet appearance</a>!</p>
<center>
<blockquote class="twitter-tweet" data-lang="en">
<p lang="en" dir="ltr">Instead of giving energy &amp; eyeballs to dumb conspiracy 🚮 check out how C👁👁L this is: <a href="https://t.co/ClmGlPMz3x"  target="_blank">https://t.co/ClmGlPMz3x</a> <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/dontfeedthebeast?src=hash"  target="_blank">#dontfeedthebeast</a></p>
<p>- KATY PERRY (@katyperry) <a href="https://twitter.com/katyperry/status/730900759873626112"  target="_blank">May 12, 2016</a></p></blockquote>
<script async="" src="//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js" charset="utf-8"></script></center>
</description>

<item>
 <title>LOL: Ryan Gosling Is Pushing Daughter Esmeralda Into a "Chalk Battle" With Neighbourhood Kids</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Ryan-Gosling-Ellen-DeGeneres-Show-May-2016-41297408</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Ryan-Gosling-Ellen-DeGeneres-Show-May-2016-41297408"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media1.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/994/n/1922398/f19e3d63_edit_img_image_845315_1463092358.large.jpg" /></a><iframe width="728" height="424" src="//widgets.ellentube.com/videos/0-8qjjgdqr/" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe><p><a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Ryan Gosling" href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/Ryan-Gosling" target="_blank">Ryan Gosling</a> stopped by <strong>The <span class="nobrand">Ellen DeGeneres</span> Show</strong> on Thursday to promote his new film,<strong> Nice Guys</strong>, and was of course asked about the other new arrival in his life: his <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Ryan-Gosling-Talking-About-His-Daughters-GMA-2016-41295275" target="_blank">second daughter, Amada Lee, who was born last month</a>. Ryan confirmed news that he was a dad of two before launching into a story about his older daughter, 19-month-old Esmeralda, and how he's been trying to show her a thing or two about respect and honour - especially when it comes to neighbourhood kids.</p>
<p>"I heard that if you tag over someone else's tag, that's how you start a battle," he said. "Now, I take my little girl to the park and we always write her name in chalk . . . and some kid has been erasing her name and writing their name over it." Ryan then explained to Ellen how he plans to teach little Esmeralda "a reasonable amount of vengeance." Watch the clip above now.<br></p>
</description>

<item>
 <title>In Breaking Romantic News, Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban Sing to Each Other in the Car</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Nicole-Kidman-Keith-Urban-Sing-Car-Video-41297350</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Nicole-Kidman-Keith-Urban-Sing-Car-Video-41297350"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media2.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/792/n/1922398/34fa2cba_edit_img_image_16360412_1463075313.large.jpg" /></a><div class='sugar-embed-player'>    <iframe type="text/html"
            src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/X_45jbE5_Y8"
            frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
</div><p>We really thought that <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Nicole Kidman" href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/Nicole-Kidman" target="_blank">Nicole Kidman</a> and <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Keith Urban" href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/Keith-Urban" target="_blank">Keith Urban</a> had <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Nicole-Kidman-Keith-Urban-Pictures-35012612" target="_blank">reached peak levels of cuteness</a>, but once again, they've proven us wrong. The couple, who tied the knot in 2006 and are parents to daughters Sunday and Faith, had their very own <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/All-James-Corden-Carpool-Karaoke-Videos-38433906" target="_self">carpool karaoke session</a> when they recently recorded themselves belting out Keith's hit "Fighter" in what appears to be an SUV. In the video, which was posted on Keith's YouTube page, the country singer shows off his killer vocals while Nicole takes on <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Carrie Underwood" href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/Carrie-Underwood" target="_blank">Carrie Underwood</a>'s parts. "Oh my God, I love this song," the actress says at the start. Not only did he gush about <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Pictures-Justin-Timberlake-Jessica-Biel-Baby-Silas-37305510" target="_blank">his precious family</a>, but he also admitted that <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Justin-Timberlake-New-Album-2016-Details-41281587" target="_blank">he definitely has a new album on the way</a>. <item>
 <title>Prince Harry and 95-Year-Old Ruth Uffleman Are Our New Celebrity Dream Couple</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Prince-Harry-Kissing-Elderly-Woman-Hand-Invictus-Games-41295243</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Prince-Harry-Kissing-Elderly-Woman-Hand-Invictus-Games-41295243"><img width="160" height="111" src="http://media2.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/886/n/1922398/f90c81e2e6345a45_GettyImages-530974384_masterpmtRWd.large.jpg" /></a><p>New couple alert? Prince Harry got up close and personal with 95-year-old Ruth Uffleman, a woman checking out the Invictus Games in Orlando, Florida, on Thursday. After presenting medals to the United Kingdom team after their wheelchair tennis match, Harry knelt down to speak with Ruth, and things got intense pretty quickly; he was spotted holding and kissing her hand, and the two posed for a few photos together while staring into each other's eyes. At one point, it even looked like Ruth was going in for a sweet smooch.
<p>Harry is now wrapping up <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Prince-Harry-Visits-United-States-Pictures-41263055" >his recent trip to the States</a> for the annual event, which hosts Paralympic-style games for wounded, injured, and sick servicemen and women. Throughout his visit, <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Prince-Harry-Invictus-Games-Photos-2016-41250516" target="_blank">he's mixed and mingled with the international teams</a> and turned on the charm for First Lady Michelle Obama and Second Lady Jill Biden, as well as <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Prince-Harry-Invictus-Games-Orlando-May-2016-41235611" target="_blank">a few babies and dogs</a>. Harry also <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Prince-Harry-Talks-About-His-Love-Life-Princess-Diana-41249405" target="_blank">opened up about his love life</a> in an interview with <strong>Sunday Times</strong> this week, saying that right now he's focused "very much on work" and that "even if I talk to a girl, that person is then suddenly my wife, and people go knocking on her door." Get ready, Ruth!</p>
</description>

<item>
 <title>Kit Harington's Comments on Falling For Rose Leslie Will Melt Your Heart</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Kit-Harington-Talks-About-Falling-Love-Rose-Leslie-41295194</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Kit-Harington-Talks-About-Falling-Love-Rose-Leslie-41295194"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media4.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/801/n/1922398/05768ed0_edit_img_image_41292297_1463076263_kit-rose-th.large.jpg" /></a><p></p>
<p>Kit Harington's sweet story about falling in love with his <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/Game-of-Thrones" target="_blank"><b>Game of Thrones</b></a> co-star Rose Leslie will definitely make you swoon. He and Rose, who played his onscreen love interest on the show, made their real-life relationship red carpet official when <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/celebrity/Kit-Harington-Rose-Leslie-Olivier-Awards-Red-Carpet-2016-40798803" >they shared loving looks</a> at the Olivier Awards last month. Recently, she also <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Kit-Harington-Rose-Leslie-Together-London-April-2016-41080891" target="_blank">stepped out to support him</a> on a special night in London, and he opened up about falling for her in a new <a href="http://www.vogue.it/l-uomo-vogue/cover-story/2016/05/11/kit-harington/"  target="_blank">interview with <b>L'Uomo Vogue</b></a>. </p>
<p>When asked about one of his best memories from the show, <a href="http://www.eonline.com/news/763909/what-game-of-thrones-kit-harington-learned-about-himself-from-reactions-to-jon-snow-s-death"  target="_blank">Kit mentioned three weeks spent filming in Iceland</a> for season two. "Because the country is beautiful, because the Northern Lights are magical, and because it was there that I fell in love," he said. "If you're already attracted to someone, and then they play your love interest in the show, it becomes very easy to fall in love." So sweet! <item>
 <title>Australian Couple Who Lost Their Children on MH17 Welcome a Daughter</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Anthony-Maslin-Marite-Norris-Welcome-Daughter-Violet-41282177</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Anthony-Maslin-Marite-Norris-Welcome-Daughter-Violet-41282177"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media4.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/12/084/n/4852708/b00c86ee_edit_img_image_3040679_1463014036_tih_b.large.jpg" /></a><p></p>
<p>The most heartbreaking of stories has finally taken a happier turn. Nearly two years after <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Anthony-Maslin-Marite-Norris-Statement-Maslin-Children-MH17-35316843" target="_blank">losing their three children, Mo, Evie and Otis</a>, and their grandfather Nick, to the MH17 disaster, Anthony Maslin and Marite Norris have welcomed a baby daughter. The couple, from Perth, released an image of the beautiful little girl, along with a statement, to the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade: </p>
<blockquote><p>"Violet May Maslin came in to the world on Tuesday 10 May, bringing with her love and light, hope and joy.   </p>
<p>Our family was torn apart when MH17 was blown out of the sky by the violent anger of a nationalist missile, on July 17, 2014.  Our three innocent, beautiful and inspiring children were killed, alongside their grandfather, Nick Norris. </p>
<p>We believe that Mo, whose 14th birthday was Saturday, Evie, 12 next week, Otis, 10 next month, and Grandad Nick have sent us an amazing gift. Violet's birth is a testament to our belief that love is stronger than hate.</p>
<p>We still live with pain, but Violet, and the knowledge that all four kids are with us always, brings light to our darkness.   As Martin Luther King said, "Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that."   </p>
<p>We will continue to love all four of our children equally.  Violet brings some hope and joy for us. We hope she brings hope and joy for you too.  </p>
<p>Finally, we would like to thank the media for respecting our privacy."  </p>
<p>Anthony Maslin &amp; Marite Norris</p></blockquote>
<p>Welcome to the world, Violet!</p>
<p></p>
</description>

 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Boy-Band-Wedding-Playlist-41282639"><img width="160" height="97" src="http://media4.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/11/979/n/1922398/81fb8e1f_edit_img_cover_file_41276302_1462996535_giphy_3_Lv7ZHG.large.gif" /></a><p>Let's face it, friends, we've grown up on boy bands, so obviously they belong at our weddings. <item>
 <title>Everything We Already Know About Justin Timberlake's New Album</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Justin-Timberlake-New-Album-2016-Details-41281587</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Justin-Timberlake-New-Album-2016-Details-41281587"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media4.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/11/791/n/1922283/0c187ef3_edit_img_image_2070144_1462988624_jt-th.large.jpg" /></a><p></p>
<p>Obsessed with <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Justin-Timberlake-Cant-Stop-Feeling-41208329" target="_blank">Justin Timberlake's new single</a>? Well, good news: There's more music on the way! While <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Justin-Timberlake-BAFTA-Television-Awards-2016-41235953" target="_blank">promoting his new movie, <b>Trolls</b></a>, JT has been casually dropping clues about his upcoming album. It's been nearly three years since he released his two-part album, <strong>The 20/20 Experience</strong>, in 2013, and fans are definitely ready for more. Check out everything we know (so far) about <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Justin Timberlake" href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/Justin-Timberlake" target="_blank">Justin Timberlake</a>'s next album, then watch <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Anna-Kendrick-Justin-Timberlake-Sing-True-Colors-Cannes-41281387" target="_blank">his must-see performance</a> of "True Colours" with <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Anna Kendrick" href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/Anna-Kendrick" target="_blank">Anna Kendrick</a>.</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>The sound:</strong> JT may be known for his pop music, but for his next album, we can also expect a little bit country, a little bit rock and roll. On 97.1 AMP Radio's Morning Show, he told Carson Daly that <a href="http://www.rollingstone.com/music/news/justin-timberlake-im-definitely-working-on-a-new-album-20160506"  target="_blank">the new album will reflect his roots</a>. "Growing up in Tennessee - very central of the country - Memphis is known as the birthplace of rock and roll but also the home of the blues, but Nashville's right down the street so there's a lot of country music," he said. This isn't too much of a surprise, considering the success of his country-inspired song "Drink You Away" and all the buzz that came after <a href="http://www.popsugar.com/entertainment/Justin-Timberlake-2015-CMA-Performance-Drink-You-Away-38989309" >his duet with country singer Chris Stapleton</a> at last year's CMAs.</li>
<li><strong>The collaborators:</strong> Justin inspired a total fan freak-out when <a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Justin-Timberlake-Pharrell-Williams-Studio-2016-40634356" target="_blank">he shared a photo in the studio</a> with Pharrell, and he later posted <a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BDNEtfkSdjs/"  target="_blank">another picture with Little Big Town</a>. Of the collaborators, <a href="http://www.capitalfm.com/artists/justin-timberlake/news/new-music-pharrell/"   target="_blank">Justin told Capital FM that he's mixing it up</a> this time, saying, "It's moving along quite nicely with Pharrell and [Timbaland], the usual suspects, and also, you know, the Swedes." He's likely referencing Swedish songwriter and producer Max Martin, who's behind some of the top hits by *NSYNC, <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Britney Spears" href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/Britney-Spears" target="_blank">Britney Spears</a>, Adele, <a class="sugar-inline-link" title="Latest photos and news for Taylor Swift" href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/Taylor-Swift" target="_blank">Taylor Swift</a>, and just about every other major pop artist.</li>
<li><strong>The release date:</strong> Justin has been very careful <i>not</i> to nail down a specific release date just yet, explaining that <a href="http://www.capitalfm.com/artists/justin-timberlake/news/new-music-pharrell/"   target="_blank">he doesn't want to be held to a certain timeframe</a>.</li>
</ul>

 <title>Here's Your First Look at Emma Roberts and Dave Franco in the Adaption of Nerve</title>
 <link>http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Nerve-Movie-Trailer-Australian-Release-Date-41281538</link>
 <description><a href="http://www.popsugar.com.au/celebrity/Nerve-Movie-Trailer-Australian-Release-Date-41281538"><img width="160" height="160" src="http://media4.popsugar-assets.com/files/2016/05/11/740/n/1922283/a1e7f327_edit_img_image_2387502_1462984724.large.jpg" /></a><iframe width="728" height="410" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2PR9MOPTI7g" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe><p>
"Are you a watcher or a player?" You might be familiar with those words if you've read Jeanne Ryan's 2012 YA novel, <strong>Nerve</strong>, which has now been adapted into a movie starring Emma Roberts and Dave Franco. Think of it like <strong>Nick &amp; Norah's Infinite Playlist</strong> meets <strong>The Game</strong>: Vee (Roberts) and Ian (Franco) meet during a whirlwind night in New York when Vee is participating in an online game of high-stakes dares. Things start off innocently enough, but soon they get out of hand when the players realise just how manipulative their audience is. The movie is out September 22; check out the trailer!</p>
</description>
